mk.tmdb.entity

Class TMDbAccount

  • java.lang.Object
    • mk.tmdb.entity.TMDbEntity
      • mk.tmdb.entity.TMDbAccount

  • public class TMDbAccount
extends TMDbEntity
    This class represent an user account. Moreover can store the authenticated session id by calling the setSessionID method. To get the the information about a specific account call the getInformation static method.
    Author:
    Mirko Polato

      • getInformation

        public static TMDbAccount getInformation(java.lang.String sessionID)
                                  throws TMDbResponseException
        Static method that gets a new Account instance filled with the basic information.
        Parameters:
        sessionID - The session ID
        Returns:
        A new user account
        Throws:
        TMDbResponseException - Throws whether the server response is not a success.
